price: 6. Behalve degene die geloven en goede daden verrichten; zij zullen hun beloning hebben die eindeloos voortduurt.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti falahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
